dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: Greetings, brave adventurer. I am King Arin, ruler of this land.

dialogue.speaker: Adventurer
dialogue.text: Greetings, Your Majesty. I have come to seek your wisdom and assistance.

dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: A dark force threatens our land. A dragon has been terrorizing the countryside, burning villages and crops. I need someone brave to defeat it.

dialogue.speaker: Adventurer
dialogue.text: I accept your quest, Your Majesty. I will do my best to defeat the dragon and save your kingdom.

dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: Thank you, brave adventurer. May the gods be with you on your journey.
